video_prompt: Woman's hair and black ribbon-like forms dynamically swirl around her head and shoulders, as if in motion. Gold textures on her skin change, appearing to shatter and flake, with glowing speckles shimmering across her face. Small, abstract golden shapes, like glowing blocks and characters, subtly shift and float in the background.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical, highly stylized, surreal woman, chest up, looking upward, against stark white background. Dominant black and gold. Woman's skin extensively covered in shimmering, textured gold (solid metallic lips, swirling patterns on neck/chest, flaked on face, glowing speckles). Flowing black, glossy, liquid/ribbon forms swirl around her head and shoulders. Scattered small, glowing golden abstract shapes (blocks, cubes, alphanumeric, zeroes, ones) throughout background. Elegant, mysterious, futuristic, cybernetic aesthetic. Digital art, dramatic lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Her hair and dark, ribbon-like elements actively swirl and undulate around her head and shoulders. Golden textures covering her skin continually shift, appearing to shatter and flake away, as luminous speckles shimmer and track across her face. In the background, small, abstract golden forms, resembling glowing blocks and characters, gently drift and reconfigure.
